the new page with user profile is opened

textbox with employee firstname is displayed and editable

user enters a new middle name "Isabella"
textbox with employee lastname is displayed and editable

gender radio button is displayed and clickable
options "Male" and "Female" are presented
user clicks on "Female" button
a dropdown menu Nationality is displayed
user selects their nationality "British"
a dropdown menu Marital Status is displayed
options "Single", "Married" and "Other" are presented
user selects marital status "Married"
user clicks on Edit-Save button
user sees a message "Successfully Saved"
user is able to see that the firstname is updated
user is able to see that the middle name is updated
user is able to see that the lastname is updated
the employee gender is updated
the employee nationality is updated
the marital status is updated
the data is presented in database
